ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you be PKed near guards? So the idea is to somehow work up and grab No drop weapons? Can they take items from bags? Can they take items that you are
ygData.messageBody:
Can you be PKed near guards?

So the idea is to somehow work up and grab No drop weapons?

Can they take items from bags?

Can they take items that you are wearing?

Is it possible to build up trust in this type of game?


> -----Original Message-----
> From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2001 3:00 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
>
>
> Nope....just your coinage and 1 item that you have equipped. At least as
> far as I know.
>
> It all depends on what kind of character you make that'll get you pked. I
> made an ogre, and I just had my first time of getting ganged by 2 trolls
> that were red to me, and I'm 11th level. Human area? LOTS of pking and
> corpses. I hear the same w/ the elven areas.
>
>
>
>
> "IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield" <persona@...> on 04/03/2001
> 02:16:50
> PM
>
> Please respond to EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>
> To: "'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'" <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> cc:
> Subject: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
>
>
> Hrmm...since we are talking about PvP Servers...
> I never have really given it a try...well because I kept getting knocked
> silly by four level 2's inside the city.
>
> Is the PK allowed to loot everything from the person he killed?
>
>
